translation.en: The Dark Army approaches, my lord. But there is still time for us to escape.
translation.it: L'Armata Oscura si avvicina, mio signore. Siamo ancora tempo per fuggire.

translation.en: Why do you think he did it?
I offered him land to last his families a lifetime over.
translation.it: Gli ho offerto terre che avrebbero sistemato generazioni.

translation.en: How could one be so stupid?
translation.it: Come si può essere così stupidi?

translation.en: Mitsuhide's prejudice grew beyond repair.
translation.it: Il rancore di Mitsuhide è cresciuto oltremisura.

translation.en: Hojo Daimyo warped his mind and fed his anger with power and corruption.
translation.it: La Daimyo ha corrotto la sua mente, alimentando la sua rabbia.

translation.en: [lord] I was referring to me.
[grunts] And look at you, Yasuke.
From servant to samurai.
The only one who didn't betray me.
translation.it: L'unico che non mi ha tradito.

translation.en: -[metallic clink] -We should drink to that.
We do not have time for this.
The Daimyo is going to bring hell through those doors.
Let them come.
They are the guest of honor to our little party.
translation.it: Sono gli ospiti d'onore della nostra festicciola.

translation.en: [Nobunaga] Yasuke, take it.
Drink with me. Celebrate this moment.
translation.it: Bevi con me. Celebriamo il momento.

translation.en: [raising voice] What is there to celebrate, my lord?
translation.it: Cosa c'è da celebrare, mio signore?

translation.en: Your forces are scattered. Your dream of a unified Japan is gone.
translation.it: Le truppe sono disperse. Il sogno di un Giappone unito è svanito.

translation.en: -The temple walls burn as we speak-- -I am still your lord.
translation.it: - Il tempio brucia mentre… - Sono ancora il tuo signore!

translation.en: If I die here, perhaps Mitsuhide will let Ranmaru live.
translation.it: Se muoio qui, forse Mitsuhide risparmierà Ranmaru.

translation.en: Are you sure he made it out in time?
translation.it: Sei sicuro che sia scappato in tempo?

translation.en: He was smuggled out on the last ship, just as you requested.
translation.it: È stato fatto salire sull'ultima nave, come ordinato.

translation.en: -Was he afraid? -No, he was strong.
translation.it: - Era impaurito? - No, è stato forte.

translation.en: Good.
Now, all that is left for me is an honorable death.
translation.it: Ora non mi resta che una morte onorevole.

translation.en: My lord, if we barricade the side entrance
translation.it: Mio signore, se barrichiamo l'entrata laterale costringendoli nei corridoi,

translation.en: and force them to enter through the halls, we can bottleneck their forces
translation.it: se barrichiamo l'entrata laterale costringendoli nei corridoi, possiamo imbottigliarli e affrontarli pochi per volta.

translation.en: and then cut them down in waves.
translation.it: possiamo imbottigliarli e affrontarli pochi per volta.

translation.en: I appoint you, Yasuke, as kaishakunin.
This is my final command of you, my friend.
translation.it: Questo è il mio ultimo ordine, amico mio.

translation.en: What? I don't understand. We could still fight back.
[lord] This is the only way to save Ranmaru.
translation.it: È l'unico modo per salvare Ranmaru.

translation.en: No, there is no honor in this.
translation.it: No, non è una morte gloriosa.

translation.en: [Nobunaga] Thank you, Yasuke.
[gasping] What are you waiting for?
[yells in Japanese] Do it! Do it!
Over here! Yassan! Over here!
[all] Thanks!
I almost landed my attack this time.
Stop bothering me. I don't care.
translation.it: Smettila di assillarmi, non mi interessa.

translation.en: Ichiro, I told you, no training in my bar.
translation.it: Ichiro, ti ho detto di non allenarti nella mia taverna.

translation.en: You're scaring away the customers.
[Ichiro] How do you grow your hair like that?
translation.it: Come fai ad avere i capelli così?

translation.en: Where do you come from? How did you get here?
translation.it: Da dove vieni? Come sei arrivato qui?

translation.en: Who taught you how to fight? Can they teach me? Can you teach me?
translation.it: Chi ti ha insegnato a combattere? Può insegnare a me? Mi insegni tu?

translation.en: I wanna fight in battles like the great samurai warriors before me.
translation.it: Voglio combattere battaglie come i grandi samurai del passato.

translation.en: I will succeed where they failed and defeat the Daimyo.
translation.it: Riuscirò dove loro hanno fallito e sconfiggerò la Daimyo.

translation.en: A true warrior, above all else, prays for peace.
translation.it: Prima di tutto, un vero guerriero desidera la pace,

translation.en: Not war.
[Ichiro] War brings peace.
Peace brings freedom.
I will save the land from the evil Daimyo.
translation.it: Salverò il mondo dalla malvagia Daimyo!

translation.en: Who am I?
I'm the greatest warrior in all the land.
translation.it: Sono il più grande guerriero della terra!

translation.en: -Huah! [gasps] -[man] Shut up. Stay right there!
Who goes there?
[woman] Practicing your swordplay again?
translation.it: Ti alleni ancora con la spada?

translation.en: [Ichiro] Practice? I'm a master.
Master? Of what?
Hey, Ichiro. Fight any bad guys today?
translation.it: Ehi, Ichiro. Hai trovato dei cattivi oggi?

translation.en: Yep. Two soldiers outside the village. Had them running scared.
translation.it: Due soldati fuori dal villaggio. Li ho messi in fuga.

translation.en: -[sighs] Those soldiers are dangerous. -I'm dangerous too.
-[chuckles] It's that samurai kid. -I'm not a kid!
translation.it: - È quel bambino samurai. - Non sono un bambino!

translation.en: Yes, you are!
Can anyone help?
Whatever you can spare.
Mercy.
Thank you!
[boy] Ichiro!
Get him!
Hey! Come back here. Damn it!
Take off that silly mask.
A samurai never shows his face.
translation.it: Un samurai non mostra mai il volto.

translation.en: [girl] Ichiro, I've already seen your face.
translation.it: Ichiro, ti ho già visto in faccia.

translation.en: So, Mr. Samurai, did you finally land an attack on Yassan?
translation.it: Allora, signor samurai, sei riuscito a colpire Yassan?

translation.en: No, but I came really close this time.
translation.it: No, ma stavolta ci ero quasi riuscito.

translation.en: I approached from his blind side, but he felt me coming.
translation.it: L'ho avvicinato dal lato cieco, ma mi ha sentito.

translation.en: I'll be better next time. [grunts]
[chuckling] I know you will.
Here, you try.
[grunts softly] I don't know.
It's okay. You'll get your strength back soon enough.
[gasps] My bokken.
Yassan gave me this.
I'm so sorry. I-- I don't know what happened.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Non so come sia successo.

translation.en: Saki, are you all right?
I'm okay, Mother.
You're on fire.
Here, take this.
What happened?
Saki was holding it, and it just split in two.
translation.it: Saki lo teneva in mano e si è spezzato.

translation.en: How will I train?
[Saki] What's wrong, Mother?
I think it's time I take you to see the doctor.
translation.it: È ora di portarti dal dottore.

translation.en: But you always said the doctor was a great journey away.
translation.it: Ma hai sempre detto che il dottore era troppo lontano.

translation.en: I like it here with my friends.
translation.it: Io voglio stare qui con i miei amici.

translation.en: There will be no discussion on this.
-How long is the journey? -[sighs]
A week on foot.
Yassan could get you there in a day or two.
translation.it: Yassan può portarvi in un paio di giorni.

translation.en: The Black boatsman?
Yes. He will be your guide, and I will be your protection.
translation.it: Sì. Lui vi guiderà e io vi proteggerò.

translation.en: A child who thinks he's a samurai.
translation.it: Un bambino che si crede un samurai.

translation.en: I will be one, one day.
What's that?
I'm looking for someone.
A woman with child. A little girl.
Well, there's plenty of women and children here.
translation.it: È pieno di donne e bambini qui.

translation.en: Yeah, sometimes they piss themselves whenever they get too drunk.
translation.it: A volte si pisciano addosso quando sono troppo ubriachi.

translation.en: Wait, no drink?
Come with me.
We have some fun.
Me?
Me?
I guess that's a vodka.
[lord] What are you waiting for?
[yells in Japanese] Do it!
An empty bottle. I've failed you.
translation.it: Una bottiglia vuota. Ti ho deluso.

translation.en: [man] Black boatsman!
What do you have for us today?
-[man 2] Lunch. -[man 1 chuckling] Oh…
Next time, Black boatsman.
Next time.
How did I do, Yassan?
Hmm. You would have done better with your bokken.
I'm sorry. It split in two.
I made that myself. You're not strong enough to split it in two.
translation.it: L'ho fatto io, tu non sei abbastanza forte per romperlo.

translation.en: -I didn't break it! -[Saki's mother] Black boatsman.
This little one here says you can help my daughter.
translation.it: Il ragazzino dice che puoi aiutare mia figlia.

translation.en: My name is Ichika.
I sing here sometimes.
Yes, I know who you are.
You have a… [hesitates] …lovely voice.
Thank you.
-[Yasuke] You have a daughter? -Yes.
That's who broke my bokken.
My daughter has grown very ill.
We must travel upstream a few days' journey for her to be cared for.
translation.it: Dobbiamo risalire il fiume per giorni per farla curare.

translation.en: The village here has a doctor who can provide care.
translation.it: Al villaggio c'è un dottore. Non c'è bisogno di andare lontano.

translation.en: -There's no need to travel upstream. -This is a special doctor.
translation.it: Al villaggio c'è un dottore. Non c'è bisogno di andare lontano. Ha bisogno di un dottore speciale.

translation.en: If we don't go, she will die.
[Yasuke] She will die if we go.
No one returns from the north. The journey would be suicide.
translation.it: Nessuno ritorna dal nord, sarebbe un suicidio.

translation.en: The warring territory is too dangerous.
translation.it: Il territorio di guerra è pericoloso.

translation.en: The risk of the journey is worth saving her life.
translation.it: È un rischio da correre per salvarle la vita.

translation.en: Just take her to the village doctor.
You have no honor!
You have no idea what honor is, boy.
translation.it: Tu non hai idea di cosa sia l'onore.

translation.en: Honor is not willingly giving up your life.
translation.it: L'onore non è buttare via la tua vita.

translation.en: Please, Yassan, save her.
I said it's too dangerous.
[man] You will love what we brought. These items come from far and wide.
translation.it: Vi piaceranno, provengono da posti lontani.

translation.en: You will be the only man on this side of the world to claim such treasures.
translation.it: Sarete l'unico di queste parti a sfoggiare questi tesori.

translation.en: [Nobunaga] Ranmaru.
What do you think?
I think it is beautiful, my lord.
I'll take it. Show me more.
What did you say, boy? You tell me I have no honor?
translation.it: Cos'hai detto? Io sarei senza onore?

translation.en: You will pay for your insolence.
[Yasuke, in Japanese] Wait!
[in English] What honor is there in striking down a child?
What's going on here?
I shall stop this at once.
Wait. This could be interesting.
Of course.
You dare speak to me? You allow your servant to speak?
translation.it: Osi rivolgermi la parola? Permetti al tuo servo di parlare?

translation.en: I apologize for his slippery tongue.
translation.it: Chiedo scusa per la sua lingua lunga.

translation.en: He should know his place, shut his mouth.
translation.it: Dovrebbe ricordarsi di tenere la bocca chiusa.

translation.en: -[people gasp] -[Yasuke] Leave the boy alone.
Guess I'll have to shut your mouth for you.
translation.it: Allora dovrò chiuderti la bocca io.

translation.en: -[bystander] Get back, get back! -[crowd murmurs]
[merchant, nervously] I am so sorry, Lord Nobunaga.
He will not go unpunished.
No need. He fought well.
translation.it: Non c'è bisogno, ha combattuto bene.

translation.en: A man deserves to be clean. Wash him.
Why is he not clean?
It is not dirt. It is the color of his skin, my lord.
translation.it: Non è sporco. È il colore della pelle, mio signore.

translation.en: Did you ink your skin black?
translation.it: Ti sei tatuato la pelle di nero?

translation.en: No, I was born with black skin.
translation.it: No, sono nato con la pelle nera.

translation.en: You were born with black skin?
translation.it: Sei nato con la pelle nera?

translation.en: [Yasuke] Yes.
Interesting. What is your name?
Eu-- I--
[chuckling nervously] I-- I apologize for his rudeness.
The Yao people have a… [hesitates] …strong cultural identity.
translation.it: Gli Yao hanno… una forte identità culturale.

translation.en: Hmm. Yao.
How about Yasuke?
I like him.
I'll take him too.
[Ichika] Make sure you have everything. If we leave now, we can avoid the patrols.
translation.it: Hai preso tutto? Se partiamo ora possiamo evitare le pattuglie.

translation.en: [hushed] Mother. Someone is here.
You're right to leave now.
Patrols are light at this time. It's wise to gain ground before dawn.
translation.it: Ci sono meno pattuglie. È saggio marciare prima dell'alba.

translation.en: Is Yassan taking us, Mother?
Yes. He is.
Beautiful land and home. Lord Nobunaga shows favor.
translation.it: Bella terra. E bella casa. Lord Nobunaga è magnanimo.

translation.en: Impressive, especially for an outsider such as yourself.
translation.it: Notevole, soprattutto per uno straniero come te.

translation.en: -You were there that day. -Indeed. You saved my little brother here.
translation.it: Tu c'eri, quel giorno. Sì. Hai salvato il mio fratellino.

translation.en: For that, you have my gratitude.
Where I'm from, it's everyone's duty to protect the children of the land.
translation.it: Da dove provengo, è dovere di tutti proteggere i bambini.

translation.en: -You're a samurai, yes? -Onna Bugeisha.
[Yasuke] Is it common in this country for a woman to gain such a high military rank?
translation.it: È comune qui per una donna raggiungere un grado militare così alto?

translation.en: [woman] No. No, it is not.
[Yasuke] Impressive.
[woman] Nobunaga awards those who have proven themselves.
translation.it: Nobunaga premia chi si dimostra meritevole,

translation.en: As you can attest.
You could have defended your brother yourself. Why didn't you?
translation.it: Avresti potuto difenderlo tu. Perché non l'hai fatto?

translation.en: The code of the samurai forbids me to interfere when honor is challenged.
translation.it: Il codice dei samurai mi proibisce di interferire quando si impugna l'onore.

translation.en: My brother made a grave mistake.
What you did was honorable in its own right.
translation.it: ma ciò che hai fatto è stato onorevole.

translation.en: You have my respect.
And whose respect do I have?
I am Natsumaru.
And what do they call you, the samurai that was once a servant?
translation.it: E invece come si chiama il samurai che un tempo era un servo?

translation.en: [Ichika] You snore.
Hm-- What's her name?
Saki. She's gotten worse in the past few weeks.
translation.it: Saki. È peggiorata nelle ultime settimane.

translation.en: Does she always sweat like this?
The sweating is new.
You should get more rest.
The boy wants to be a great warrior. He looks up to you.
translation.it: Il ragazzo vuole diventare un guerriero. Ti ammira.

translation.en: Why? Who are you?
I'm just a boatsman.
Nothing special about me. He's just impatient to become a man.
translation.it: Niente di speciale. È solo impaziente di diventare grande.

translation.en: Well, I've seen the way you move to avoid his attacks.
translation.it: Beh, ho visto come eviti i suoi attacchi.

translation.en: I hear the things you say,
translation.it: Sento come parli, come gridi nel sonno,

translation.en: the way you yell out in your sleep, like a man haunted by his past.
translation.it: Sento come parli, come gridi nel sonno, come un uomo perseguitato dal passato.

translation.en: The necklace you wear.
That symbol is familiar. I-I've seen it before.
translation.it: Quel simbolo mi è familiare. L'ho già visto.

translation.en: -[Ichika] Why are you doing this? -Doing what?
Helping us. Why did you change your mind?
translation.it: Perché ci aiuti? Perché hai cambiato idea?

translation.en: [Yasuke] One village.
[Ichika] And what does that mean?
[Yasuke] Where I'm from, every man and woman cares for every child.
translation.it: Da dove provengo, tutti si prendono cura dei bambini.

translation.en: It is our duty to make sure every child is safe.
translation.it: È nostro dovere assicurarci che siano al sicuro.

translation.en: -[Saki coughing] -[Ichika] It's okay.
[Yasuke] I've seen many illnesses but nothing like this.
translation.it: Ho visto molte malattie, ma mai come questa.

translation.en: She's a special child.
She requires special care. That is all you need to know.
translation.it: Ha bisogno di cure speciali, ti basti sapere questo.

translation.en: Why are you stopping?
I am not stopping.
[robot] He's Black.
We can see that.
[robot] I thought you were the only Black man in Japan.
translation.it: Pensavo l'unico nero in Giappone fossi tu.

translation.en: [chuckles] Apparently not.
[robot] Are you two related?
[man] Shut up, scrap metal.
[woman] He's kinda cute for an old man.
translation.it: È carino, per essere un vecchio.

translation.en: [robot] Your attraction to him is illogical.
translation.it: La tua attrazione per lui è illogica.

translation.en: The child, Chernyy.
Why are you here for this child?
So be it, Chernyy.
So be it, indeed.
[in Japanese] No honor to be had here. Only pain and blood.
translation.it: Non c'è gloria in questa lotta. Solo dolore e sangue.

translation.en: -[in English] What was that? -He just spoke Japanese.
translation.it: Che ha detto? Parlava in giapponese.

translation.en: The Black man spoke Japanese?
Yes. I spoke Japanese.
You speak Japanese and recite ancient proverbs.
translation.it: Parli giapponese e pronunci antichi proverbi.

translation.en: You must have lived a good life.
translation.it: Devi aver vissuto una bella vita.

translation.en: -Mother! -[groaning]
[yells] Leave us alone!
